__e: Arizona and I haven't had much "Alone time" lately, and so instead, we eat.
Ah, Sofia's been acting out, asking questions about me and Arizona, and I don't know what to tell her or how to tell her, so I'm just not sleeping.
Something else happened, and I-I can't explain it, but suddenly the plane was here in Arizona, and, yes, I know how that sounds, but I am telling you the truth.
